description: Mitsui is Fuuko`s first friend before Fuuko`s accident. Although Mitsui still remembers Fuuko, she acts coldly towards her, refusing Fuuko`s invitation to her sister`s wedding, as she is more concerned about her third year exams. Tomoya depicts her as a disgusting class representative because of her treatment towards Fuuko. Out of a miracle, she appeared in her sister`s wedding.
name: Mitsui
